thread.title: Robbers make off with two cash boxes in KZN
thread.title_full: Robbers make off with two cash boxes in KZN | News24

author: news24.com
title: Robbers make off with two cash boxes in KZN
text:
Johannesburg - Armed robbers made off with two cash boxes in Stanger, KwaZulu-Natal, after opening fire upon security guards late on Saturday morning, provincial police said.
"Three security guards went to collect cash from one of the garages in the area," spokesperson Major Thulani Zwane told News24.
"When they were going to their vehicle, they were approached by a number of suspects who opened fire towards the guards and took two boxes containing cash."
One of the security guards was wounded and taken to hospital for treatment.
